author: pipermerriam
content:
During next week's ACD (February 27th) there will be a slot for teams to give an update on their 4444s progress.  This is me requesting for teams to have someone available to give an update during that call. 

- how will your client behavior change on drop day on [May 1st](https://days.to/until/1-may) (70 days from now)
- your team's progress on this change.
